name: SPACE DEFENDER
description:
The galaxy was suddenly attacked by alien life forms known as the space invaders.
Fast numbers of them enveloped the galaxy and destroyed planets
Your mission with the best space pilots in the galaxy will be to destroy the space invaders ...
disclaimer:
You may need to upgrade your current SD Card to a compatible SDHC Card or microSDHC Card with enough available space to download this software.
Visit support.nintendo.com for information about storage options. Sold separately.
